mapper.select: select b.nickname from ( select users_no from follow where follow_users_no = #{users_no} ) a ,users b where a.users_no = b.users_no

select e.rn,e.post_no,e.users_image,e.nickname,e.title,e.regdate,e.users_no from ( select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rn,a.post_no, c.users_image,c.nickname,a.title,a.regdate,a.users_no from post a,( select users_no from follow where follow_users_no=#{authUser_no}) b, users c,(select @rownum:=0) d where a.users_no = b.users_no and a.users_no = c.users_no order by regdate desc ) e where (#{page}-1)*10+1 <= rn and rn <= #{page}*10

select p.rn,p.post_no,p.post_image,p.users_image,p.nickname,p.users_no,p.title,p.regdate,( select count(*) from post_comments pc where pc.post_no =p.post_no) as count from ( SELECT @rownum := @rownum + 1 AS rn, a.post_no, a.post_image, c.users_image, c.nickname, a.title, a.regdate, a.users_no FROM post a, (SELECT users_no FROM follow WHERE follow_users_no = #{authUser_no}) b,users c,(SELECT @rownum := 0) d WHERE a.users_no = b.users_no AND a.users_no = c.users_no ) p where rn<=5 order by count desc;
